hero.description: We help you save time and money, and increase the chances of project success.

challenge.title: Software Development Projects Don't Start Without Preparation
challenge.intro: You might have a clear vision in your mind, but are you facing difficulties at the start due to the following issues?

points.1: Difficulty in selecting an outsourcing development agency
points.2: Difficulty in assessing the rationality of outsourcing cost estimates
points.3: Lack of a requirements document to solve the problem
points.4: Difficulty in synchronizing business goals with the development agency

solution.title: Get Help from a Requirements Expert Who Understands Both Business and Technology
solution.description: Kooslab provides a clear software requirements document within two weeks to help you start your project quickly.

features.title: Requirements Engineering
features.description: Systematically analyze business goals and translate them into technical requirements, bridging the understanding between development and business teams.

features.title: Process Optimization
features.description: Optimize the entire development lifecycle to eliminate unnecessary delays and increase project efficiency.

features.title: Development Consulting
features.description: Provide expert guidance throughout the process, including outsourcing selection, cost optimization, and requirements change management.

features.title: Requirements Documentation
points: Write clear and actionable user stories
Provide documents that can be shared with development teams and stakeholders
Create designs that provide an overview of data flow and system structure

features.title: Requirements Management
points: Systematically manage priority setting and change requests
Track requirements linked to business goals
Manage and review changes in requirements during development

features.title: Support for Selecting Development Agencies
points: Establish evaluation criteria and support selection of outsourcing development agencies
Analyze and optimize the appropriateness of estimates
Review development schedules and risk factors
Protect intellectual property and review contracts

starter.name: Starter
features: Provide an overview of the development process
Provide and explain a user story requirements template
Checklist for reviewing outsourcing development agency selection

basic.name: Basic
features: Review client business and existing materials
Participate in a 1-day user story creation workshop
Create a user story-based requirements document
Add development cost estimation for an additional $300

professional.name: Consulting
features: Use 40 hours per month flexibly according to the client's situation
Participate in development agency evaluation and selection

1.quote: In a situation where there was no one internally with a high understanding of development or developers, we were able to discover pages, features, and user stories that we hadn't thought of through the workshop.
1.author: Jenny Wang

2.quote: The process of prioritizing the vague yet enormous requirements/expectations we had for the new product development was particularly beneficial. Thanks to the clear requirements deliverables, we were able to focus on solving the essential problems.
2.author: Nicholas Yang

3.quote: It was helpful in managing the scope and cost of the project, and having an external expert facilitate discussions that were difficult to organize internally allowed us to quickly organize high-priority development requirements.
3.author: Kim OOO

4.quote: By conducting workshops with stakeholders, I realized the importance of visualizing and systematically organizing what was previously just vague thoughts about specific features.
4.author: Lee Hyejeong
